Name: Masarada Town Story
About the game: 'Masarada Town Story' is an all-age RPG game developed by Sugar Starâ˜… and published by BokiBoki Games! Story This is Masarada Town. It is a lonely town that few tourists visit. The birth rate in the town continued to decline, and young people were leaving town for the city. The old people who have supported the town for a long time are getting older, and the population aging is getting worse. If it goes on like this, will the town disappear like this? The mayor decided to inject new blood into the town. To unearth all the charm of this town, study the geography and find folklore As a result of various investigations, there are many rare and rare stones here. If a museum were built and these rare stones displayed, people would definitely gather in this town! That's why I, Takarayama Jewel, were sent to this small town to work hard to mine rare ores! Game Features Relaxing small town RPG game Explore the map Collect assorted stones Increase town prestige Improve the goodwill of residents Upgrade your gear Fight various monsters
